Package game.items

Class PerishableFoodItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.PortableItem
game.items.EdibleItem
game.items.PerishableFoodItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class PerishableFoodItem
extends EdibleItem
Represents a food that can rot.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation)
      Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground. Checks the rotting progress of the food.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.
